meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were purty.
meanings.sent2: She wore a purty dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The sunset painted the sky in a purty shade of pink.
meanings.sent4: The purty melody of the song brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The purty landscape took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: She sings purty well for someone so young.
meanings.sent2: He did purty good on his test.
meanings.sent3: The cat purty much sleeps all day.
meanings.sent4: The sun purty shines on this side of the house.
meanings.sent5: The flowers purty bloom in the spring.
